result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Santos S Espinoza

records.addlTxt:
$500 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail.
- ELVIRA SANCHES @  917 S 19TH STREET MANITOWOC, WI 54220.

Order Denying Defendant's Motion to Modify Bond.
It is hereby ordered that the defendant's motion is hereby denied.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Zoom appearances.  Defendant in custody in Manitowoc County Jail.
Parties argue the motion.
Based on the defendant's history of not complying with court orders, the Court denies the motion.
State to draft order.
Minutes.
Motion hearing on September 23, 2022 at 11:15 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
1:50 p.m. Defendant in custody.  9/13/22 email inducement.  Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed. Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
Offer deadline:  10/21/22, 8:30 a.m.
Further proceedings scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

2:20 pm - Defendant Santos S Espinoza appeared by video, in custody, at Manitowoc County Jail.  Attorney Heather Faeh in court for Santos S Espinoza.  Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant qualifies for public defender, he just needs to sign up for this case.  Defendant demands a preliminary hearing. 
Preliminary hearing is set for 09-14-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 3
Preliminary hearing on September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

Defendant appears, in custody, on warrant.  Initial appearance is set for 09-12-2022 at 1:30pm.  Bail is set at $500.00 cash.
Bail not furnished; defendant remanded to the county jail.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.
Re:  Felony failure to report to jail, on 05-26-22.
